spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: RX Sampler Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIV_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: div_reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to diversity rx sampler

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRI_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: pri_reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to primary rx sampler

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_A_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: RX DATA A FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET22
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to data a fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_BD_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: DATA BD FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET30
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to data bd fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_C_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: DATA C FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET38
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to data c fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_IFC_PRI_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Primary IFC FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET46
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to primary ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_RFICUS_PRI_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Primary RFICUS FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET54
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to primary rificus fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_RFICR_PRI_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Primary RFICR FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET62
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to primary rificr fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_IFC_DIV_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Diversity IFC FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET70
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to diversity ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_RFICUS_DIV_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Diversity RFICUS FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET78
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to diversity rficus fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_RFICR_DIV_SW_RST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Diversity RFICR FIFO Software Reset Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RESET86
spirit:field.spirit:description: reset 0x0 = asserts a software reset to diversity rficr fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_LCT_TBL_PRI
spirit:register.spirit:description: LCT Table Configuration for Primary FIFOS Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_C94
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary data c channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_BD95
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary data bd channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_A96
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary data a channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICR97
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary rficr channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICUS98
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary rficus channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: IFC99
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of primary ifc channel

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_LCT_TBL_DIV
spirit:register.spirit:description: LCT Table Configuration for Diversity FIFOS Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_C107
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity data c channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_BD108
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity data bd channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_A109
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity data a channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICR110
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity rficr channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICUS111
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity rficus channel

spirit:field.spirit:name: IFC112
spirit:field.spirit:description: lct value of diversity ifc channel

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_A_THD
spirit:register.spirit:description: Threshold Configuration for DATA A FIFO flags Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: O_A_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data a fifo threshold to create ovf indication

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_A_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data a fifo threshold to create dma request

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_BD_THD
spirit:register.spirit:description: Threshold Configuration for DATA BD FIFO Flags Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: O_BD_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data bd fifo threshold to create ovf indication

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_BD_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data bd fifo threshold to create dma request (in gsm mode)

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_C_THD
spirit:register.spirit:description: Threshold Configuration for DATA C FIFO Flags Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: O_C_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data c fifo threshold to create ovf indication

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_C_THRSH
spirit:field.spirit:description: data c fifo threshold to create unf indication

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_BD_SEL
spirit:register.spirit:description: DATA BD FIFO in WB or GSM Mode Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA_BD_MODE
spirit:field.spirit:description: data_bd_mode 0x1 = data bd fifo is in wb mode

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_DATA_DMA_SKIP
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configure the DATA A & BD FIFOs Interface to DMA Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: SKIP
spirit:field.spirit:description: skip 0x1 = extract any 2nd word from fifo to the dma (for data a fifo and data bd fifo in gsm mode)

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_MODES
spirit:register.spirit:description: Operational Modes Configuration Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_SWTCH165
spirit:field.spirit:description: switch 0x1 = switch between primary & diversity rfics connections to the rx samplers

spirit:field.spirit:name: TT_DIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: tt_dis 0x1 = disable time tracking (tt) operation

spirit:field.spirit:name: CLK_RATE
spirit:field.spirit:description: clk_rate 0x0 or 0x1 = rx works in high rate 0x2 = rx works in medium rate 0x3 = rx works in slow rate

spirit:field.spirit:name: FILTER_CFG
spirit:field.spirit:description: filter_cfg this field configures the number of samples to enter the filter. 0x0 = 1 phase (the selected one) 0x1 = 3 phases (selected phase + 1 neighbor from each side) 0x2 = 5 phases (selected phase + 2 neighbor from each side) 0x3 = 7 phases (selected phase + 3 neighbor from each side)

spirit:field.spirit:name: TT_INTEG
spirit:field.spirit:description: tt_integ this field is used for the number of cycles to integrate tt indication before changing phase (value between 0x1 to 0x3f).

spirit:field.spirit:name: TT_CFG
spirit:field.spirit:description: tt_cfg this field configures early and late phases distance used for tt. 0x0 = use the same phase as the selected phase 0x1 = 1 sample from the selected phase 0x2 = 2 sample from the selected phase 0x3 = 3 sample from the selected phase 0x4 = 4 sample from the selected phase 0x5 = 5 sample from the selected phase

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_2_RFIC_SEL
spirit:register.spirit:description: Support of 2 RFICs Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: SLCT
spirit:field.spirit:description: select 0x1 = configures digrf3 rx to support two rfics

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_FORCE_PHASE
spirit:register.spirit:description: Sampling Phase Configuration (debug mode) Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIV_FORCE
spirit:field.spirit:description: div_force 0x1 = force diversity sampler phase by dsp

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIV_PHASE
spirit:field.spirit:description: div_phase this field configures the diversity sampler phase.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRI_FORCE
spirit:field.spirit:description: pri_force 0x1 = force primary sampler phase by dsp

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRI_PHASE
spirit:field.spirit:description: pri_phase this field configures the primary sampler phase.

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_IQ_SWAP
spirit:register.spirit:description: Swap I & Q Bits Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: SWAP
spirit:field.spirit:description: swap this field swaps i & q bits in the digrf3 rx outputs to wb as follows. 0x0 = normal operation 0x1 = swap between i & q metrics in the fifos output 0x2 = swap between 1st and 2nd words in the fifos output 0x3 = swap between 1st and 2nd words & between i & q metrics in the fifos output

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_LATCH_STATUS
spirit:register.spirit:description: Status Latch Command Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_CMD213
spirit:field.spirit:description: command this command determines what status to latch. refer to table below.

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_RD_STATUS
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read Latched Status Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_STATUS225
spirit:field.spirit:description: status this field reads the latched status value.

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_CLR_STICKY
spirit:register.spirit:description: Clear Sticky Bits Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_RFICR_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_rficr_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_RFICR_FIFO_OVF
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_rficr_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_RFICUS_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_rficus_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_RFICUS_FIFO_OVF
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_rficus_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_IFC_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_ifc_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_D_IFC_FIFO_OVF238
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_ifc_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_RFIFCR_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_rficr_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_RFICR_FIFO_OVF
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_rficr_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_RFICUS_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_rficus_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_RFICUS_FIFO_OVF
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_rficus_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_IFC_FIFO_INT
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_ifc_fifo_interrupt 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_P_IFC_FIFO_OVF244
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_ifc_fifo_ovf 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: P_SMPL_SYNC_ERR
spirit:field.spirit:description: diversity_sampler_sync_error 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: D_SMPL_SYNC_ERR
spirit:field.spirit:description: primary_sampler_sync_error 1 followed by 0x0 = clear the sticky bit

spirit:register.spirit:name: DIGRF_RX_SHUTDOWN
spirit:register.spirit:description: Line-Receiver Shutdown Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF_SHTDN254
spirit:field.spirit:description: shutdown 1 = shutdown the digrf rx and turn off the lr vcm

spirit:register.spirit:name: RFICUS_RFICR_PRI_PSx
spirit:register.spirit:description: Primary RFICUS FIFO PS Value Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PS262
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload size of entry x in the primary rficus/rficr fifos

spirit:register.spirit:name: IFC_PRI_RD__LAST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read Payload Data From Primary IFC FIFO/Last Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PYLD270
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload data from the primary ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RFICUS_RFICR_PRI_RD_LAST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read Payload Data From Primary RFICUS/RFICR FIFO/Last Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PYLD277
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload data from the primary rficus/rficr fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RX_PRI_FIFOS_INT_HANDLE_W
spirit:register.spirit:description: Select Primary FIFO To Which to Write Payload (write access) Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICR285
spirit:field.spirit:description: rficr 1 = selects reading from primary rficr fifo

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICUS286
spirit:field.spirit:description: rficus 1 = selects reading from primary rficus fifo

spirit:field.spirit:name: IFC287
spirit:field.spirit:description: ifc 1 = selects reading from primary ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RX_PRI_FIFOS_INT_HANDLE_R
spirit:register.spirit:description: Select Primary FIFO From Which to Read Payload (read access) Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: NUM_WRDS295
spirit:field.spirit:description: number of words stored in the primary fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RFICUS_RFICR_DIV_PSx
spirit:register.spirit:description: Payload Size of Diversity RFICUS/RFICR FIFO/Last Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PS303
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload size of entry x in the diversity rficus/rficr fifos

spirit:register.spirit:name: IFC_DIV_RD__LAST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read Payload From Diversity IFC FIFO/Last Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PYLD311
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload data from the diversity ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RFICUS_RFICR_PRI_RD_LAST
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read Payload From Diversity RFICUS/RFICR FIFO/Last Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: PYLD318
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload data from the diversity rficus/rficr fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RX_DIV_FIFOS_INT_HANDLE_W
spirit:register.spirit:description: Select Diversity FIFO To Which to Write Payload (write access) Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICR326
spirit:field.spirit:description: rficr 1 = selects reading from diversity rficr fifo

spirit:field.spirit:name: RFICUS327
spirit:field.spirit:description: rficus 1 = selects reading from diversity rficus fifo

spirit:field.spirit:name: IFC328
spirit:field.spirit:description: ifc 1 = selects reading from diversity ifc fifo

spirit:register.spirit:name: RX_DIV_FIFOS_INT_HANDLE_R
spirit:register.spirit:description: Select Diversity FIFO From Which to Read Payload (read access) Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: NUM_WRDS336
spirit:field.spirit:description: number of words stored in the diversity fifo
